SELECT M.USER_NO AS USER_NO , M.USER_PSWD AS USER_PSWD , M.ENABLED AS ENABLED , M.USER_TYPE AS USER_TYPE , A.ROLE_CD AS ROLE_CD , S.USER_NM AS USER_NM , S.USER_BRDT AS USER_BRDT , S.USER_GENDER AS USER_GENDER , S.USER_EML_ADDR AS USER_EML_ADDR , S.USER_PHONENO AS USER_PHONENO , S.USER_ZIP AS USER_ZIP , S.USER_ADDR AS USER_ADDR , S.USER_DADDR AS USER_DADDR , S.USER_PROFILE AS USER_PROFILE
FROM TB_USER M LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_ROLE_ASSIGN A ON (M.USER_NO = A.USER_NO)
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_STU S ON (M.USER_NO = S.STU_NO)
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP S ON (M.USER_NO = S.EMP_NO)
LEFT OUTER JOIN TB_EMP S ON (M.USER_NO = S.EMP_NO)
WHERE M.USER_NO = #{userNo}
SELECT USER_NM ,JOIN_DT FROM TB_STU WHERE USER_NM = #{joinName} AND USER_PHONENO = #{joinPhone}
SELECT SMS_CN FROM TB_SMS WHERE SNDNG_DT >= SYSDATE - INTERVAL '5' MINUTE AND SMS_RCVR = #{smsRcvr} /* 수신자 연락처 */ AND SMS_CN = #{smsCn} /* 인증번호 */
SELECT A.STU_NO , A.USER_BRDT , A.USER_GENDER , B.SVLF_NM FROM TB_STU A INNER JOIN TB_SVLF B ON A.SVLF_NO = B.SVLF_NO WHERE A.USER_NM = #{userNm} AND A.USER_PHONENO = #{userPhone}
SELECT STU_NO , USER_NM , SVLF_NO , USER_EML_ADDR , USER_PHONENO , USER_ZIP , USER_ADDR , USER_DADDR , REG_DT , USER_BRDT , USER_GENDER FROM TB_STU WHERE STU_NO = #{stuNo}
